programme.title: Belle Starr
programme.desc: Belle Starr is the daughter of a Southern aristocrat. When the invading Yankees take over her land, she vows revenge and heads to Missouri where she marries Confederate outlaw Sam Starr, and joins him and his gang in harrying the occupying troops. In fact, the real Belle Starr was a simple outlaw who, with her Cherokee husband, used the opportunity of the confusion of war to line their own pockets.

programme.title: Law and Order: Special Victims Unit

programme.title: Top Gear
programme.desc: Jeremy Clarkson, Richard Hammond and James May are dropped deep in the Bolivian rain forest armed only with three 4x4s which they bought from the local small ads for a maximum of £3,500 each. They attempt to drive from the heart of Bolivia to the coast of Chile, encountering drug lords and the debilitating effects of high altitude. Without a doubt one of the toughest challenges the `Top Gear team has ever faced.

programme.title: Matthew Perry and the Ketamine Queen
Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: After the success of his comeback fight, Tommys road to redemption hits a major setback - his hand is injured again and needs eight weeks total rest before doctors will know if he can fight again. The last time he couldnt train, his life spiralled out of control, so now Tommy throws himself into a frenzy of activity: a TV appearance on The Wheel, family days out with Bambi, and a final push to finish the home he hopes Molly and Bambi will soon return to.

programme.title: Tommy: The Good. The Bad. The Fury
programme.desc: Tommys recovery is back on track after he and John put his hand to the test. The pair are training again, and the search for Tommys next opponent begins. Eager to make the most of family time, Tommy splashes out on a £90,000 motor home for family trips with Molly and Bambi and takes his mum out for lunch and a long-overdue catch-up.

programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Its a new trip with antiques experts Charles Hanson and Roo Irvine. Follow their adventure around South Yorkshire.

programme.title: The Marvellous Miniature Workshop
programme.desc: Sara Cox meets lifelong friends Sue and Kathie, who want a miniature of Winford Hospital in Somerset, where they trained as nurses in the 1960s. Miniaturist Hannah recreates a ward and a sitting room, capturing the hard work of their youth.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: Denise Nurse is in the Carmarthenshire countryside, showing a retired couple from Jersey some special homes, including one which comes complete with some beavers in the backyard.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Bob Harris and Suzi Perry swap music and motors for a Japanese boat and Westwood jewels.

programme.title: BBC News
programme.desc: Twenty-four hours a day, the latest national and international stories as they break.

programme.title: Politics Live
programme.desc: Jo Coburn invites a panel of guests to share their opinions on the newsmaking stories of the day.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Thirty players compete across the series, scoring points by answering questions correctly. However, they must avoid the impossible answers, otherwise they will be eliminated from the show until the next day.

programme.title: Funny Face
programme.desc: A Madison Avenue photographer transforms a timid saleswoman into one of the fashion worlds most glamorous models. The Gershwin-scored film includes `How Long Has This Been Going On?, He Loves and She Loves, and `S Wonderful.

programme.title: Nigel Slaters Simple Suppers
programme.desc: Nigel Slater encourages viewers to step out of their culinary comfort zone with an adventurous supper of herb butter squid, proving that adventurous doesnt have to mean complicated.

programme.title: Natural World
programme.sub-title: Kangaroo Dundee and Other Animals: Part 2
programme.desc: In central Australia, Brolga, the worlds most famous `kangaroo mum, is learning what it takes to look after his extended animal family. The three emu chicks are beginning to wreak havoc, the camels are rapidly outgrowing their backyard enclosure and Pete, the southern hairy-nosed wombat, is proving to be quite a handful. To help, Brolgas looking to move some of the animals to his 80-acre sanctuary.

programme.title: Gordon Buchanan: Elephant Family and Me
programme.desc: Gordon returns to Kenya to follow baby elephant Wiva and her family in the height of the dry season. A new baby, Gawa, is born creating an extraordinary celebration. But will Wiva be left out in the cold now that theres a new baby in town?

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: The team is at Rochester Cathedral in Kent. Antiques expert Elizabeth Talbot discovers a valuable sculpture that narrowly escaped being destroyed forever and Raj Bisram finds a ghostly Victorian photo album. Meanwhile, Paul Martin uncovers the history of the Royal Engineers, the unsung heroes of the UK armed forces.

programme.title: Richard Osmans House of Games
programme.desc: In this special festive edition, celebrity contestants Richie Anderson, Simon Gregson, Jessica Knappett and Debbie McGee take on a series of rounds selected by the host, quiz legend Richard Osman.

programme.title: Strictly Come Dancing: It Takes Two
programme.desc: Janette Manrara dishes up more backstage gossip and behind-the-scenes action from the world of Strictly. Theres a chat with one of the remaining couples as they gear up for the semi-finals and two dances. Plus an exclusive first look at how some of the couples are faring in the training rooms.

programme.title: Mary Makes Christmas
programme.desc: In a magnificent coastal setting, Dame Mary Berry wants to show the nation how to make delicious gifts for family and friends this Christmas. Joined by Strictly dancer Oti Mabuse, TV favourite Amanda Holden and DJ Nick Grimshaw, Mary has the ideal recipes to gift, including sumptuous mini Christmas cakes, chewy and crispy almond snowballs and spicy Christmas chutney.

programme.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.desc: Paul takes Bob on a steam train to the north of England to search for a prized English salmon. Alongside their canine companion, Ted, they fish the rivers Eden and Tyne in search of for their elusive quarry.

programme.title: Lucy Worsley Investigates
programme.desc: How did the Black Death change Britain? Lucy Worsley examines the latest science, and explores how the huge death toll affected religious beliefs, class structure, work and women.

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.desc: A special festive edition hosted by the fabulous Tom Allen, who introduces Thanyia Moore and Lloyd Griffith to the stage.

programme.title: Newsnight
programme.desc: Featuring extensive coverage of the days top national and international news stories, along with explanations about the context and potential aftereffects.

programme.title: BBC Weather
programme.desc: The latest weather forecast.

programme.title: All Is True
programme.desc: The year is 1613, and Shakespeare is acknowledged as the greatest writer of the age. But disaster strikes when his renowned Globe Theatre burns to the ground. Devastated, Shakespeare returns to Stratford, where he must face a troubled past and a neglected family. Haunted by the death of his only son, Hamnet, he struggles to mend the broken relationship with his wife and daughters. In so doing, he is ruthlessly forced to examine his own failings as a husband and father.

programme.title: Mortimer and Whitehouse: Gone Fishing
programme.desc: Comedians and lifelong friends Bob Mortimer and Paul Whitehouse share their personal and hilarious life experiences while travelling around the UK fishing for elusive species.

programme.title: Daisy May and Charlie Coopers NightWatch
programme.desc: On their final paranormal quest, Daisy and Charlie hike to a remote bothy deep in the Scottish Highlands, where they will spend the night in complete isolation, cut off from civilisation.

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Timmy and Kid are obsessed with triangles. Nothing else will do. Art, food, cushions - everything must be three-sided. Until, that is, they attempt to build a tower of blocks and race a toy car with triangular wheels. For Timmy, triangles are so over. Now only circles will do.

programme.title: Our Family
programme.sub-title: Iona and Elbas Wizardy Windy Day
programme.desc: Magic is in the air as Mum has a wizarding surprise waiting for Iona and Elba in the garden. Later, the whole family head out to launch their kite in the windy sky.

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Vinnies family is English and they come from a city called Bristol, which is located in the west of England. Bristol is famous for hot-air balloons and pirates! Vinnie makes his tarts by mixing the leaves from parsley and thyme into cream cheese.

programme.title: Ferne and Rorys Teeny Tiny Creatures
programme.desc: Tommy wants to know everything about very jumpy creatures, grasshoppers. Chantelle is at a zoo to go on a jungle safari with Heather. They meet stick insects and praying mantises.

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: Its autumn time. Jud, Jessica and their class visit a local park to collect leaves for an art project. Back at school, they use the leaves to create a huge leaf print picture - and things end up getting messy! The school playground is covered in leaves and the school caretaker, Mr Clever, needs help clearing them up. Luckily, he has a team of super leaf sweepers, who come to the rescue.

programme.title: Graces Amazing Machines
programme.desc: Series for young children that celebrates lots of different amazing machines. In this episode, motorcycle rider Grace shows off three amazing machines that are all built for fun!

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say sun, and we go on a whirlwind word adventure! We see a yellow sun, a setting sun and a sporty one. Dee even snowboards in the sun!

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: They came from outer space to divide the Numberblocks into Twos. Who can stop the invasion of division with the Numberblocks?

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: Alphablock Letter Team OW conjures up exciting costumes for a fancy-dress party.

programme.title: Wonderblocks
programme.desc: Its film night, but how can Go and Stop get the movie to start?

programme.title: Colourblocks
programme.desc: Fun Pink arrives in Colourland. Learn about the colour pink with the Colourblocks.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Ding dong, there is somebody at the door. It is delivery Chipmunk with a parcel for Duggee, but why is it wrapped up like a present? Maybe it is Duggees birthday.

programme.title: Yukee
programme.desc: Sonny organises a tea party in his caravan to show off his new musical instrument, but rain pours through his leaky roof. While his plans for a musical afternoon seem like a washout, the gang may find another use for all those rain-filled bottles.

programme.title: Something Special

programme.desc: Justin and friends enjoy ice cream weather, while Mr Tumble dodges a rain shower.

programme.title: Teletubbies

programme.title: Andys Aquatic Adventures

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
programme.desc: The animals are all looking forward to waking up early to watch the dawn chorus, but Huffty doesnt stir when the alarm goes off. Raa Raa and the others try to wake the sleeping elephant in time.

programme.title: The Game Catchers

programme.title: Vida the Vet

programme.title: Supertato

programme.title: The Weasy Family

programme.desc: Mojo and Bo have to carry Jacksons big blue chicken Ludwig (who definitely isnt a chicken) to the country fair. But the easily-startled bird gets away from them... The chase is on.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: Bingo and Dad must brave a swooping magpie protecting its nest when they go on a curry swap to Mackenzies house through the park.

programme.title: Hollyoaks

programme.title: Dating Naked UK
programme.desc: After the first dumping, the daters are still seeking their connections. With some relationships severed, the way is paved for new ones to grow. A game of Dare or Bare leaves one dater with a regrets.

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc: Edinburgh musician Jamie is tired of the life of groupies and flings and seeks a deeper connection. Jasmin from Bognor has ME, a chronic fatigue illness, and needs acceptance from a new lover.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: While Sheldon is at home in Texas, the rest of the gang decorate for Christmas and think about how much he has affected their lives.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: After Leonard tries to help Penny following a failed role on a TV show, she makes an important decision.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Pop singer Ben, who was a smash hit in the 1980s, meets Sarah, who used to have his poster above her bed. Will student Jamess unconventional party trick impress Emilie?

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer asks Mr Burns for a pay rise after the family have to dress up as a Mariachi band and sing for their dinner, but Mr Burns has a better idea, hiring Homer as his prank monkey, paying him to throw pudding at Lenny, eat an expensive Spider-Man comic in front of Comic Book Guy, and enter the panda enclosure at the zoo in a panda costume.

programme.title: Young Sheldon

programme.title: Modern Family

programme.title: The Goldbergs

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Howard and Bernadette struggle to leave Halley in day care, while Bert introduces the gang to his new girlfriend, Rebecca.

programme.desc: Raj attempts to cure his anxiety about talking to women, while Penny uses Bernadette to spy on Leonard and his girlfriend.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Bernadette receives her PhD and the gang begin to tease Wolowitz for being the only one among them who isnt a doctor. Meanwhile, Koothrappali becomes Sheldons new flatmate after hearing Leonard and Priya engaging in a `Star Trek bedroom fantasy.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: In the opening episode of the fifth series, Penny worries that shes screwed things up with her friends after her night with Raj. Meanwhile, Sheldon takes command of the paintball team.

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.sub-title: A Math Emergency and Perky Palms

programme.title: Young Sheldon
programme.sub-title: A Loaf of Bread and a Grand Old Flag
programme.desc: When the taste of his favourite sandwich loaf changes, Sheldon boycotts a bread company and ends up on the local news.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A new teacher at school named Mr. Lassen is determined to crush Bart Simpsons spirit.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: A mid-life crisis has Homer taking up bass guitar and forming a cover band with other dads, but the bands success is threatened by the breakout potential of one of its members.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldons well-organised world is turned upside down when he learns that the barber who has cut his hair for years has passed away. As his orderly routines descend into chaos, he is forced to act like a hippy in order to match his shaggy new hairstyle. Meanwhile, Howard is sent to Houston for the gruelling NASA training programme and shares horrific stories about his experiences with Bernadette via Skype.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Amy gets upset with Sheldon when he breaks his promise to accompany her to her aunts birthday party and instead opts to join the guys for a `Star Wars video game marathon lasting the entire weekend. Later, Penny convinces Amy that she should confront Sheldon about the matter and demand an apology.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Desperate to find a `plus one to take to a wedding, Raj finally gives up and asks his parents to set him up with a date. Meanwhile, Penny buys Leonard and Sheldon some `Star Trek memorabilia, but she is irked when they refuse to play with the toys in case their value is diminished by removing them from the packaging.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: When Stephen Hawking comes to lecture at the university for a week, Wolowitz is given the task of maintaining his wheelchair, making Sheldon green with envy. When Sheldon begs Wolowitz to introduce him to his hero Hawking, Wolowitz takes full advantage and only agrees after making Sheldon carry out a series of humiliating tasks, including doing his laundry, cleaning his room, and taking his mother dress shopping.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Homer invests all the familys money in a company that makes `Animotion machines. After the company declares bankruptcy, Homer becomes a human guinea pig to raise some cash. The scientists find a crayon lodged in his brain and when it is removed, he suddenly becomes extremely intelligent.

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: When Homer ends up in the prison infirmary after visiting the prison rodeo, Marge notices the artistic talent of jailbird Jack Crowley and vouches for him at his parole hearing. However, when she gets him a job painting a mural at the school, he clashes artistically with Principal Skinner. Meanwhile, Homer sets up a chiropractor business with the help of an old dustbin, aka the Spine-O-Cylinder.

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: Chateau DIY
programme.desc: Jon and Carmen transform a disused, smoke-damaged kitchen into a medieval dining room. Alison and Zion crack on with their chateaus exterior, but can they get it wedding-ready?

programme.title: Chateau DIY

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Simon and Mary Loyne have sold their Cheshire home and cant wait to move to Spains Costa Almeria. Danni Menzies shows them five fabulous properties for their budget of £100,000, but do they go for a townhouse or an apartment close to the beach?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: South London. Stylist Felicia treats her guests to a fashion and glam-themed night, complete with red carpet catwalk. But do her guests think she has the je ne sais quoi?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Musician Be hopes to impress his guests with a gastronomic world tour and travel-themed game. Will his holiday vibe fly high or will he hit turbulence along the way?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: South London. TV editor Joe hosts a 90s-themed night. But will his smile fade as his starter scorches, or can he cool the heat in the kitchen with his home-made ice cream? (Ep3/5)

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: South London. Video director Dean plans to knock the socks off his guests with his tried-and-tested fiery prawn saganaki and espresso martini brownies. But is it enough to win?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: South London. Yoga teacher Helen brings calm to the end of the week with her Thai-inspired menu and a Zen yoga-themed night. But will simmering tensions ruin the positive vibes?

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Alan and Sylvie are first to host in their seafront establishment Watersedge Guest House in Barton on Sea, Hampshire. The first guests to arrive are Blackpool boys Mike and Danny of Homecliffe Hotel, who locate dust and grime enough to grumble. Next through the door are Tim and Amelia, owners of Nearwater BandB, St Mawes. Austrian-born Eva of the Roundhouse Hotel in Weymouth, loves her spacious garden room.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Its Tim and Amelias turn to host the rival BandB owners at their non-star-rated boutique accommodation, Nearwater, on the south Cornish coast. After a detailed inspection from Mike and Danny, they find fuel for their fire in some rather surprising places. Evas feeling confident about a good nights sleep after testing the mattress, and Sylvie and Alan are still trying to get their head around what `boutique really means.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Its the turn of Austrian-born Eva Buschmann to host in her cosmopolitan boutique BandB on the Weymouth seafront, the Roundhouse Hotel. First to arrive are Danny and Mike who are a little shocked when Eva offers them a double room with an exposed shower.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Showmen Mike and Danny host their rival BandB owners on day four at their four-star rated guest house - Homecliffe Hotel - in Blackpool. After the harsh criticism Tim and Amelia received from Mike and Danny, the couple arrive at Homecliffe determined to find problems with the cleanliness of the room.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Its the final day and all the BandB hosts gather for one last time to find out how much theyve been paid. Watersedge hosts Alan and Sylvie kick things off, but ahead of discovering how much theyve been paid, theyre keen to question Tim and Amelia who complained about their room having no en suite.

programme.title: The Dog House
programme.desc: Laura looks to shower someone new with her affection; Lizzie and Jason look for a new companion.

programme.title: Grand Designs

programme.title: Britains Most Expensive Houses
programme.desc: The brokers at UK Sothebys International Realty are back to secure more multimillion-pound sales. Lee has an incredible grade I listed terraced home to sell overlooking Regents Park lake. And Guy has been invited to sell a rather unusual houseboat.

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Mechanic Grant, whos 34, is rushed to AandE, having been crushed against a brick wall by his own car while he was working on it. Doctors are concerned he has a serious pelvic injury and other internal injuries.

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Five-year-old Kayla is rushed into St Georges struggling to breathe. Shes accompanied by her worried mum, Rachel. Doctors try to find out whats wrong and give Kayla drugs to relax her chest muscles.

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: A drunk man kicks off at the paramedics in the back of the ambulance, a taxi driver is cut out of his vehicle after a road traffic collision, and the construction of a summer house goes badly wrong when sheets of plywood land on the builders head.

programme.title: Transformers: Age of Extinction
programme.desc: As humanity picks up the pieces after an epic battle, a shadowy group emerges to gain control of history. Meanwhile, a powerful new menace sets its sights on Earth.

programme.title: Hero
programme.desc: To the court of the King of Qin, who seeks to rule the united country, comes Nameless, who claims to have killed three deadly assassins who were all determined to kill the King. As Nameless recounts his exploits in flashback, each time the wily King responds with his version. Is Nameless a true servant of Qin or does he have a secret agenda?

programme.title: Shane
programme.desc: A former gunslinger must strap on his six-shooter once again to defend homesteaders from a greedy cattle baron.

programme.title: The Scorpion King
programme.desc: In a time before the pyramids, an evil king threatens to take over the world, so the leaders of the remaining tribes under threat call upon a desert warrior to help them defeat the wicked one and his brutal hordes. As the warrior battles against the evil around him, he is preparing for a final showdown that will decide if it is to be his destiny to become the great Scorpion King.

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: As war with the Transformers rages on, inventor Cade Yeager forms an unlikely alliance with Bumblebee, an English lord and an Oxford professor to save the planet.

programme.title: 300: Rise of an Empire
programme.desc: Greek Gen. Themistocles leads the charge to fight invading Persian forces led by the god Xerxes -- once a mortal -- and Artemisia.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hairs-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.desc: Battle-scarred stuntman Colt Seavers springs back into action when a movie star suddenly disappears. As the mystery deepens, he soon finds himself ensnared in a sinister plot that pushes him to the edge of a fall more dangerous than any stunt.

programme.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash manipulates the Speed Force to put The Flash into a time loop, which forces him to re-live the same day over and over again. The Flash must find a way to restore time and finally apprehend his worst enemy before all is lost.

programme.title: Riverdance
programme.desc: An Irish boy and a Spanish girl journey into the mythical world of the Megaloceros Giganteus who teach them to appreciate Riverdance as a celebration of life.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Flightless birds lead a mostly happy existence, except for Red, who just cant get past the daily annoyances of life. His temperament leads him to anger management class, where he meets fellow misfits Chuck and Bomb. Red becomes even more agitated when his feathered brethren welcome green pigs to their island paradise. As the swine begin to get under his skin, Red joins forces with Chuck and Bomb to investigate the real reason behind their mysterious arrival.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: Curious George is an inquisitive little monkey with an insatiable taste for adventure. Georges fun-loving enthusiastic nature endears him to new friends, but also lands him in a series of misadventures.

programme.title: LEGO DC Super Heroes: The Flash
programme.desc: Reverse-Flash manipulates the Speed Force to put The Flash into a time loop, which forces him to re-live the same day over and over again. The Flash must find a way to restore time and finally apprehend his worst enemy before all is lost.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: Red, Chuck, Bomb and the rest of their feathered friends are surprised when a green pig suggests that they put aside their differences and unite to fight a common threat. Aggressive birds from an island covered in ice are planning to use an elaborate weapon to destroy the fowl and swine way of life. After picking their best and brightest, the birds and pigs come up with a scheme to infiltrate the island, deactivate the device and return to their respective paradises intact.

programme.title: The Garfield Movie
programme.desc: Garfield, the Monday-hating, lasagna-loving indoor cat, finds himself on a wild outdoor adventure when his long-lost father draws him into a high-stakes heist.

programme.title: Rise of the Guardians
programme.desc: Winter sprite Jack Frost must save the day when an evil boogeyman schemes to stop the worlds children from believing in Santa Claus, the Easter Bunny and other immortal Guardians.

programme.title: Wallace and Gromit in The Curse of the Were-Rabbit
programme.desc: The village is being overrun by rabbits and Wallace has a plan to alter their minds so that they will leave the vegetable allotments alone. However, his plan goes awry and the rabbit problem escalates when the villagers discover a monstrous `were-rabbit destroying everything in its sights. Will Wallace and Gromit be able to solve the conundrum before the creature gets shot?

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The sequel to `Madagascar, in which New York Zoo animals, Alex the Lion, Marty the Zebra, Melman the Giraffe and Gloria the Hippo, still stranded on Madagascar, start to leave the island. All of a sudden, they land in the wilderness of Africa, where Alex meets the rest of his family, but has trouble communicating with them after spending so much time at the Central Park Zoo.

programme.title: Bon Voyage Charlie Brown (And Dont Come Back)
programme.desc: The Peanuts gang spends two adventure-filled weeks in Europe as exchange students.

programme.title: The Canterville Ghost
programme.desc: Sir Simon de Canterville has been haunting the grounds of his country estate for more than 300 years, but he soon meets his match when he tries to scare off a modern-day American family that just moved in.

programme.title: Dragon Rider
programme.desc: A dragon, an orphaned boy, and a mountain spirit work together as they trek through the Himalayas in search for the Rim of Heaven.

programme.title: The Swan Princess: The Secret of the Castle
programme.desc: Princess Odette and Prince Dereks wedding anniversary celebrations are rudely interrupted by evil wizard Clavius, who once again wants to conquer the world. When Clavius kidnaps Queen Uberta, Odette and Derek must put a stop to his fiendish schemes.

programme.title: Batman: Return of the Caped Crusaders
programme.desc: Batman and Robin have their hands full when Penguin, The Joker, Riddler and Catwoman join forces.

programme.title: The Amazing Maurice
programme.desc: Maurice is a streetwise ginger cat who comes up with a money-making scam by befriending a group of self-taught talking rats. When Maurice and the rodents meet a bookworm called Malicia, their little con soon goes down the drain.

programme.title: Jackass: The Movie
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and his mad companions leap onto the big screen. Expect the usual mad gross-out japes, from making snow cones out of urine to using the display toilets in bathroom outlets, and from racing golf carts over hallowed greens to tightrope walking over alligators.

programme.title: Jackass 3
programme.desc: Johnny Knoxville and the gang unleash their most insane stunts yet, from roller-skating with a buffalo herd, to playing tennis with a beehive.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa .5
programme.desc: Irving Zisman takes his young and impressionable grandson on a cross-country trip in which they encounter male strippers, biker-bar patrons and other unsuspecting citizens.

programme.title: Finding Your Feet
programme.desc: A middle-class snob on the eve of retirement takes refuge with her bohemian sister after she discovers her husband is having an affair with her best friend.

programme.title: The Death of Stalin
programme.desc: When dictator Joseph Stalin dies, his parasitic cronies square off in a frantic power struggle to become the next Soviet leader. As they bumble, brawl and back-stab their way to the top, the question remains -- just who is running the government?

programme.title: See No Evil, Hear No Evil
programme.desc: Lighthearted adventures of a pair of news vendors in New York - one deaf, one blind - who go on the run when they are blamed for the murder of a customer. Each has seen - or heard - just a whiff of a clue, and a frantic chase ensues as the duo struggle to clear their names.

programme.title: Galaxy Quest
programme.desc: The stars of a 1970s sci-fi show - now scraping a living through re-runs and sci-fi conventions - are beamed aboard an alien spacecraft. Believing the casts heroic on-screen dramas are historical documents of real-life adventures, the band of aliens turn to the ailing celebrities for help in their quest to overcome the oppressive regime in their solar system.

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: A teen suffers the pain of adolescence as she longs for Mr. Right while fending off the advances of the class clown.

programme.title: Alfie
programme.desc: In London during the swinging sixties, a promiscuous Cockney lad who lacks purpose or direction habitually seduces women and then moves on. When one of his girlfriends becomes pregnant, he refuses to marry her, preferring instead to carry on with more conquests, but eventually something happens which forces him to reconsider his shallow existence.

programme.title: Shirley Valentine
programme.desc: Shirley is a Liverpudlian housewife stuck in a loveless marriage. One day she finds herself talking to the wall, and decides to make some changes in her life. Flying off to the Greek island of Mykonos on her own, she is gently romanced by middle-aged waiter Costas.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: Click
programme.desc: A workaholic father finds that there are not enough hours in the day to balance his job and home life, until he discovers a remote control that can pause and rewind time. However, when it malfunctions, chaos ensues, and the man realises that he has lost control of his life.

programme.title: Its Complicated
programme.desc: When attending their sons college graduation, a couple reignite the spark in their relationship. However, the complication lies in the fact that they are divorced and he has remarried.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: A musical adaptation of Alice Walkers novel about the life-long struggles of an African-American woman living in the south during the early 1900s.

programme.title: The China Syndrome
programme.desc: Kimberly Wells is a TV news reporter, Richard Adams her cameraman. While shooting a routine piece at a nuclear power plant with manager Jack Godell, theres an emergency. A faulty gauge has resulted in cooling water being drained from the core. Seconds from disaster, Godell manages to avert `The China Syndome - in theory, the core melts, falls through the Earth and comes out in China.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: Biopic nominated for five Oscars. The story of Dian Fossey, the conservationist who battled poachers and red tape for 20 years to save a species, including her relationship with photographer Bob Campbell and her tragic murder.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: A sports agent who makes the mistake of saying what he believes, finds himself sacked and abandoned by all his clients apart from small time footballer Rod Tidwell. Maguires personal life starts to fall apart as hes torn between love and money in Cameron Crowes metaphor on Americans need for success and money.

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: Frank is a retired Lt Col in the US army. Hes blind and impossible to get along with. Charlie is at school and is looking forward to going to university; to help pay for a trip home for Christmas, he agrees to look after Frank over thanksgiving. Franks niece says this will be easy money, but she didnt reckon on Frank spending his Thanksgiving in New York.

programme.title: The Good Half
programme.desc: A man returns home to Cleveland for his mothers funeral, where he must confront his grief, reconnect with estranged family members, and forge new relationships.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: New York widow Holly is devastated by her husbands sudden demise, but messages he left behind offer a ray of hope.

programme.title: I, Tonya
programme.desc: In 1991, talented figure skater Tonya Harding becomes the first American woman to complete a triple axel during a competition. In 1994, her world comes crashing down when her ex-husband conspires to injure Nancy Kerrigan, a fellow Olympic hopeful, in a poorly conceived attack that forces the young woman to withdraw from the national championship. Hardings life and legacy instantly become tarnished as shes forever associated with one of the most infamous scandals in sports history.

programme.title: Ordinary Angels
programme.desc: A struggling hairdresser finds a renewed sense of purpose when she meets a widowed father and his two daughters. With his youngest critically ill and waiting for a liver transplant, the fierce woman rallies an entire community to help.

programme.title: Holiday Inn
programme.desc: Jim Hardy quits showbiz to run a farm with dance partner Linda Mason, but she stays on stage to pair up with Ted Hanover. A romantic merry-go-round with a spring in its step and a medley of favourite seasonal tunes by Irving Berlin.

programme.title: Holiday Inn
programme.desc: Jim Hardy quits showbiz to run a farm with dance partner Linda Mason, but she stays on stage to pair up with Ted Hanover. A romantic merry-go-round with a spring in its step and a medley of favourite seasonal tunes by Irving Berlin.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: A musical adaptation of Alice Walkers novel about the life-long struggles of an African-American woman living in the south during the early 1900s.

programme.title: The China Syndrome
programme.desc: Kimberly Wells is a TV news reporter, Richard Adams her cameraman. While shooting a routine piece at a nuclear power plant with manager Jack Godell, theres an emergency. A faulty gauge has resulted in cooling water being drained from the core. Seconds from disaster, Godell manages to avert `The China Syndome - in theory, the core melts, falls through the Earth and comes out in China.

programme.title: American Sniper
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Chris Kyle.

programme.title: Gorillas in the Mist
programme.desc: Biopic nominated for five Oscars. The story of Dian Fossey, the conservationist who battled poachers and red tape for 20 years to save a species, including her relationship with photographer Bob Campbell and her tragic murder.

programme.desc: Jim Hardy quits showbiz to run a farm with dance partner Linda Mason, but she stays on stage to pair up with Ted Hanover. A romantic merry-go-round with a spring in its step and a medley of favourite seasonal tunes by Irving Berlin.

programme.title: A Tigers Journey
programme.desc: In the valleys of the Himalayas, an orphan boy saves a Bengal tiger cub from poachers who killed the animals mother. The two head to the Taktsang monastery in Buthan, known as "The Tigers Nest".

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop
programme.desc: Paul Blart desperately wants to become a cop, but he is too fat to pass the physical exam. He instead works as a security guard in a shopping mall. One day criminals put the mall under siege, and Blart takes it upon himself to save the day.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.desc: Live-action version of the classic stone-age cartoon series. Fred Flintstone donates his family savings to help neighbour Barney Rubble and wife Betty adopt a child, much to the dismay of mother-in-law Pearl. To return the favour, Barney swaps slabs with Fred in an aptitude test, resulting in Freds being promoted and becoming involved in an embezzlement plot, while Barney is left in the dole queue.

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: In a parallel universe, young orphan Lyra Belacqua resides in Oxford under the patronage of her dashing adventurer Uncle, Lord Asriel. When Lyra comes into possession of an alethiometer, a compass that truthfully answers any question, there are people who will do anything to get hold of it, and Lyra finds herself on an epic quest to the frozen North to safeguard the future of her entire world.

programme.title: The SpongeBob SquarePants Movie
programme.desc: Theres trouble brewing in Bikini Bottom. Someone has stolen King Neptunes crown, and it looks like Mr Krab, SpongeBobs boss, is the culprit. Though hes just been passed over for the promotion of his dreams, SpongeBob stands by his boss, and along with his best pal Patrick, sets out on a treacherous mission to Shell City to reclaim the crown and save Mr Krabs life.

programme.title: Zathura: A Space Adventure
programme.desc: Family adventure about two squabbling siblings who find a mysterious old board game in their basement. The bickering brothers discover the game has magical powers when a chance roll of the dice sends their house into deep space, where they must battle with aliens and work together to stay alive.

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: Volcanologist Trevor Anderson journeys into the Earths core after discovering evidence that the famous authors story was based on fact. Accompanied by his teenage nephew Sean and fellow scientist Hannah, Trevor is soon coming face-to-face with an astonishing and extremely perilous hidden world.

programme.title: Bean: The Ultimate Disaster Movie
programme.desc: Mr Bean has somehow managed to get a job as a security guard. His latest assignment finds him travelling to America as an art expert, looking after the famous `Whistlers Mother painting as it is transported from Britain to a posh new Los Angeles museum. The catch is that Bean is no art expert and his trip was a ploy by his British employers to get rid of him. Unfortunately, no one has warned the Americans about Mr Bean.

programme.title: Mr Beans Holiday
programme.desc: Mr Bean is going on holiday to the south of France, looking for a quiet and sunny trip in the Riviera. However, his trip doesnt go as smoothly as he expected when he has to face a series of misunderstandings and totally unfortunate coincidences. Eventually, Mr Bean will end up spoiling the last film of the snobbish director Carson Clay and appearing by accident at the Cannes Film Festival.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: A magic portal transports the little blue people to Manhattan, where they must find a way back to their village before evil wizard Gargamel can find them.

programme.title: The Smurfs 2
programme.desc: Papa and the rest of the Smurfs reunite with their human friends to rescue Smurfette from the clutches of evil wizard Gargamel.

programme.title: Stardust
programme.desc: In a countryside town bordering on a magical land, a young man ventures into the realm of fairies to retrieve a fallen star in order to win the heart of his beloved.

programme.title: The Cat in the Hat
programme.desc: Humorous adaptation of the classic Dr Seuss childrens book, in which two housebound children are visited by a cat who saves them from their rainy-day boredom by bringing mayhem to their house.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: Pretty in Pink
programme.desc: High school oddball Ducky idolises his best friend Andie but shes smitten with wealthy classmate Blane who might be interested - if she wasnt so poor. Do the pair have a future together?

programme.title: The BFG
programme.desc: A 10-year-old girl, Queen Victoria and the Big Friendly Giant must devise a plan to get rid of Bloodbottler, Fleshlumpeater and all the other bad giants once and for all.

programme.title: Breakfast at Tiffanys
programme.desc: Blake Edwards bittersweet tale about the seemingly air-headed elegant socialite Holly Golightly whose façade hides pain and loss, and Paul Varjak, a blocked writer with his own dark secrets who falls for her. As their Manhattan-based romance progresses, one of them will end up heartbroken.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: Lost in Translation
programme.desc: In Tokyo shooting a whisky commercial, middle-aged actor Bob Harris becomes attracted to Charlotte, the young wife of a celebrity photographer. Together they ride out their boredom of hotel life and their bewilderment of the city.

programme.title: Oceans Eleven
programme.desc: Slick crime caper in which a thief, recently released from prison, rounds up a team of top criminals to rob three Las Vegas casinos owned by the man who is now dating his ex-wife.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two wisecracking Miami cops are forced to swap identities in order to track down $100 million of heroin stolen from the police. Their only lead is a young woman who can identify the culprits, but when they track her down, she mistakes one of the cops for his partner, forcing the pair into a bizarre and chaotic life swap.

programme.title: The Beekeeper
programme.desc: One mans brutal campaign for vengeance takes on national stakes after its revealed hes a former operative of a powerful and clandestine organisation known as Beekeepers.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: A massive creature attacks a deep-sea submersible, leaving it disabled and trapping the crew at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean. With time running out, rescue diver Jonas Taylor must save the crew and the ocean itself from an unimaginable threat: a 75-foot-long prehistoric shark known as the megalodon.

programme.title: Fast and Furious 8
programme.desc: The globetrotting crew faces an unexpected challenge when a mysterious woman named Cipher forces Dom to betray them all. Now, they must unite to bring home the man who made them a family and stop her from unleashing chaos on a grand scale.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Two wisecracking Miami cops are forced to swap identities in order to track down $100 million of heroin stolen from the police. Their only lead is a young woman who can identify the culprits, but when they track her down, she mistakes one of the cops for his partner, forcing the pair into a bizarre and chaotic life swap.

programme.title: Superman II
programme.desc: Having fallen in love with Lois, Superman agrees to sacrifice his powers to be with her. His last act as a superhero has an unexpected side effect, when a bomb he hurls into space to save the Eiffel Tower accidentally releases the three villains trapped in the `Phantom Zone in the first `Superman movie. The super criminals set about conquering the Earth, while Clark sits helpless.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: Until Dawn
programme.desc: Exploring an abandoned visitor centre, Clover and her friends encounter a masked killer who murders them one by one. However, when they mysteriously wake up at the beginning of the same night, theyre forced to relive the terror over and over again.

programme.title: The Wasp
programme.desc: Based on the play by Morgan Lloyd Malcolm.

programme.title: Escape From the 21st Century
programme.desc: Three friends discover they have the power to travel back and forth twenty years with a sneeze. The future is not as good as they hoped, and they need to take on the responsibility of saving the world.

programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A weekend getaway turns bloody and violent when a subservient android thats built for human companionship goes haywire.

programme.title: The Wasp
programme.desc: Based on the play by Morgan Lloyd Malcolm.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.title: Restless
programme.desc: A middle-aged empty nesters mundane life is upended when raucous new neighbours move in next door, unleashing potential danger and disruption.

programme.title: Arcadian
programme.desc: In the near future on a decimated Earth, Paul and his twin sons face terror at night when ferocious creatures awaken. When Paul is nearly killed, the boys come up with a plan for survival, using everything their father taught them to keep him alive.

programme.title: Ready Player One
programme.desc: In 2045 the planet is on the brink of chaos and collapse, but people find salvation in the OASIS: an expansive virtual reality universe created by eccentric James Halliday. When Halliday dies, he promises his immense fortune to the first person to discover a digital Easter egg thats hidden somewhere in the OASIS. When young Wade Watts joins the contest, he finds himself becoming an unlikely hero in a reality-bending treasure hunt through a fantastical world of mystery, discovery and danger.

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: Primatologist Davis Okoye shares an unshakable bond with George, an extraordinarily intelligent silverback gorilla thats been in his care since birth. When a genetic experiment goes wrong, it causes George, a wolf and a reptile to grow to a monstrous size. As the mutated beasts embark on a path of destruction, Okoye teams up with a discredited genetic engineer and the military to secure an antidote and prevent a global catastrophe.

programme.title: Absolution
programme.desc: An ageing Boston gangster tries to reconnect with his family and fix the mistakes from the past, but his criminal lifestyle soon threatens to destroy everything he holds dear.

programme.title: The Killer
programme.desc: When a feared contract killer refuses to murder a young blind woman on the orders of her handler, she finds herself hunted by old colleagues and a determined detective.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Children of Men
programme.desc: In England 2027, worldwide infertility has left the population on the brink of extinction and all hope of a cure is lost. However, underground activist Julian shows up with a miraculously pregnant girl.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: In the near future, industrial espionage of information systems is so rife, couriers have the information transmitted into implants in their brain that can hold gigabytes of information. Johnny Mnemonic is one of these couriers whos doubled his capacity to a dangerous 180 gigabytes and if he doesnt download in 24 hours, hell die. Unfortunately, a gang of Japanese Yakuza mobsters are after whats in his head.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Arrival
programme.desc: A linguistics professor leads an elite team of investigators in a race against time to communicate with extraterrestrial visitors.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Companion
programme.desc: A weekend getaway turns bloody and violent when a subservient android thats built for human companionship goes haywire.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Waterworld
programme.desc: Big-budget tale of the battle for survival in a world where dry land has disappeared with the melting of the polar ice caps. One man, who has become amphibious, tries to protect survivors on an artificial atoll made from scrap metal by taking on a gang of marauding pirates. He is also intent on discovering if there is any truth in the myth that there is still some land left above water.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: A Quiet Place
programme.desc: A family must navigate their lives in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound. Knowing that even the slightest whisper or footstep can bring death, a couple protect their children while desperately searching for a way to fight back.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Pitch Black
programme.desc: A deep space transporter crash-lands on a desolate planet circled by three suns. Among the survivors are pilot Carolyn Fry, mystic Abu `Imam al-Walid, cop William J Johns and convicted criminal Richard B Riddick, and their first thoughts are of survival and escape. Then Fry finds out that the planet suffers a total eclipse every 22 years, which is when the hibernating, flesh-eating inhabitants awake and hunt.

programme.title: Christmas With the Kranks
programme.desc: Luther Krank, fed up with the commerciality of Christmas, decides to skip the holiday and go on vacation with his wife, an easy decision to make with their daughter away anyway, but when she suddenly decides to come home, uproar ensues in the rush to celebrate Christmas at the last minute.

programme.title: National Lampoons Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: Clark Griswold sets out to give his family a traditional Christmas. While his in-laws, among them a cousin from hell, sample his hospitality, they find themselves battling against rabid squirrels, and an exploding sewer to achieve a family Christmas that they will never forget.

programme.title: Arthur Christmas
programme.desc: Everyone knows that, each Christmas, Santa Claus delivers presents to every last child on Earth. What everyone doesnt know is that Santa accomplishes the feat with a very high-tech operation beneath the North Pole. But when the unthinkable happens, and Santa misses one child out of hundreds of millions, someone has to save the day. Its up to Arthur (James McAvoy), Santas youngest son, to deliver a present to the forgotten tyke before Christmas morning dawns.

programme.title: A Boy Called Christmas
programme.desc: An ordinary young boy called Nikolas sets out on an adventure into the snowy north in search of his father who is on a quest to discover the fabled village of the elves, Elfhelm. Taking with him a headstrong reindeer called Blitzen and a loyal pet mouse, Nikolas soon meets his destiny.

programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.desc: A young boy who doesnt believe in Santa Claus is shocked to see a train stop outside his window on Christmas Eve destined for the North Pole. When he accepts an invitation from the conductor to climb on board, he embarks on a white-knuckle ride to Santas headquarters where he learns an invaluable lesson about the true spirit of Christmas.

programme.title: Daddys Home 2
programme.desc: Brad and Dustys respective fathers show up to turn Christmastime upside down.

programme.title: Happy Christmas
programme.desc: An immature party girl moves in with her brothers family to get over a breakup and throws their lives out of whack.

programme.title: Elf
programme.desc: Finding out that hes actually human, Buddy the elf leaves the North Pole to find his real dad in bustling New York, but when he gets there, his mean old dad doesnt want to know. While hes trying to convince his father, he gets a job as a department store elf, which he should be perfectly cut out for.

programme.title: Tinsel Town
programme.desc: A washed-up Hollywood action hero takes a role in a small English villages quirky Christmas pantomime, where he finds unexpected inspiration through the shows straight-talking dance instructor.

programme.title: Genie
programme.desc: With his life unraveling around him, Bernard dusts off a jewelry box and unintentionally releases genie Flora, who might just be able to help him.

programme.title: Gremlins
programme.desc: A placid small town is brought to its knees by an infestation of destructive small creatures with a vicious sense of humour.

programme.title: Theres Something in the Barn
programme.desc: Bill moves his American wife Carol and children Nora and Lucas to Norway where hes inherited a family estate. There, Lucas discovers a mischievous barn elf from ancient folklore living in the barn who elf plots to get rid of the American intruders.

programme.title: Krampus
programme.desc: A wicked demon seeks out naughty people, and terrorises a family in order to punish them at Christmas time.

programme.title: Reindeer Games
programme.desc: An ex-cons plan to pose as his late cellmate backfires when he is roped into a casino heist on Christmas Eve.

programme.title: The Thicket
programme.desc: When a bounty hunter and a band of unlikely heroes pursue a brutal killer, they find themselves in a deadly no-mans-land known as the Thicket.

programme.title: Twilight of the Warriors: Walled In
programme.desc: The notorious Kowloon Walled City serves as a fortified, lawless safe haven for gangs and refugees alike. But when a skilled underground fighter runs afoul of the most feared Triad boss in Hong Kong.

programme.title: The Dry
programme.desc: Aaron Falk goes back home to his drought-stricken town to attend a tragic funeral. However, his return reopens the door to the unsolved death of a teenage girl.

programme.title: The Independent
programme.desc: Elisha is a dogged reporter who wants to break front-page news. After old-school columnist Nick teams up with her, she stumbles upon a bigger conspiracy.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleones 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: A lieutenant general and a colonel face political opposition after ordering a drone missile strike to take out a group of suicide bombers in Nairobi, Kenya.

programme.title: Oceans 8
programme.desc: Criminal mastermind Debbie Ocean and seven other female thieves try to pull off the heist of the century at New Yorks annual Met Gala. Their target: a necklace thats worth more than $150 million.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if hell live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. The four are reunited when they chance across one of the abusive guards and take the chance for revenge.

programme.title: Detroit
programme.desc: As rioting and civil unrest rocks Detroit during the summer of 1967, several policemen begin interrogating guests at the Algiers Motel. By the end of the night, three unarmed men are gunned down while several others are brutally beaten.

programme.desc: Aaron Falk goes back home to his drought-stricken town to attend a tragic funeral. However, his return reopens the door to the unsolved death of a teenage girl.

programme.title: The Independent
programme.desc: Elisha is a dogged reporter who wants to break front-page news. After old-school columnist Nick teams up with her, she stumbles upon a bigger conspiracy.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Vito struggles to make a living, legally or illegally, for his wife and family in 1910s Little Italy, while Michael Corleones 1950s business expansion and lust for power leads to paranoia and the destruction of his family.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: Eye in the Sky
programme.desc: A lieutenant general and a colonel face political opposition after ordering a drone missile strike to take out a group of suicide bombers in Nairobi, Kenya.

programme.title: Oceans 8
programme.desc: Criminal mastermind Debbie Ocean and seven other female thieves try to pull off the heist of the century at New Yorks annual Met Gala. Their target: a necklace thats worth more than $150 million.

programme.title: Collateral
programme.desc: After a long day, LA taxi driver Max is about to knock off when sharp-suited Vincent offers him $600 to make five stops. Sounds good until Vincent turns out to be a merciless hitman and each one of those stops involves a hit. As the night goes on, Max starts to wonder if hell live to see the sunrise, as the pair are hunted by the police and the FBI.

programme.title: Sleepers
programme.desc: Eleven years after their horrific experiences at reform school, Tommy Marcano and John Reilly have become two-bit American gangsters, Lorenzo Carcaterra is a reporter and Michael Sullivan an assistant DA. The four are reunited when they chance across one of the abusive guards and take the chance for revenge.

programme.title: Detroit
programme.desc: As rioting and civil unrest rocks Detroit during the summer of 1967, several policemen begin interrogating guests at the Algiers Motel. By the end of the night, three unarmed men are gunned down while several others are brutally beaten.

programme.title: Entourage
programme.desc: Ari poaches teen star Zac Efron from Adam Davies, who retaliates by offering Lloyd a job. Drama investigates Vinces stalker after hearing a tip. Meanwhile, the guys decide to increase their security after a break-in, and Eric makes Ashley suspicious.

programme.title: Entourage
programme.desc: Drama is keen to get out of his contract on Five Towns to win a part on another show, and Ari and Lloyd go head-to-head to be the first to manage it. Turtle is conflicted about his relationship with Jamie-Lynn and a UCLA student, and Ashley has a request for Eric.

programme.desc: Section 20 special-ops soldiers Thomas "Mac" McAllister, Samuel Wyatt and Gracie Novin are sent to investigate the crash of a Russian bomber in the South China Sea. programme.desc: Unusual synaptic patterns in Siskos brain send him back to the 1950s where he experiences racism as a struggling science fiction writer.

programme.desc: When mother-of-three Paige Birgfeld went missing in 2007, the case went cold until a hikers discovery of her remains in 2012 revived the investigation and eventually led police to close the net on a local mechanic.

programme.title: Road Wars
programme.desc: Thames Valley police provide more remarkable footage of vehicle theft, high-speed chases and dangerous driving in this seasonal special.

programme.title: Grimm
programme.desc: Hank and Nick find some agents searching for Wesen artifacts.

programme.title: Wynonna Earp
programme.desc: Following her late Uncle Curtiss instructions Waverly visits a mysterious woman known as the Blacksmith for a binding ceremony with the bequeathed skull. Agent Dolls struggles with withdrawal symptoms.

programme.title: Night Cops
programme.desc: Officers deal with a violent person and a reckless driver.

programme.title: Brit Cops: Rapid Response
programme.desc: Following rapid response officers, the fastest cops in Britain, as they crack down on crime.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Waters
programme.desc: Dive to the darkest depths of the sea to uncover the oceans most mysterious inhabitants. Journey across vast stretches of open water with humpback whales, then wander down to the ocean floor to witness breathtaking bioluminescence.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas
programme.desc: Exploring the Atacama Desert, the worlds driest non-polar region.

programme.title: Brazil Untamed
programme.desc: A look at the wildlife of Brazil.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Series following the residents of Dorsets Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre. Eighty-eight capuchin monkeys rescued from a research laboratory in Chile wake up to their first morning at Monkey World. Over in the Chimp nursery, Rodders has a run-in with a sticky melon, and the parks naughtiest resident, Seamus the chimp, comes face to face with alpha male Butch in the bachelor pad.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Chimps Ben and Pip are due to be moved out of the nursery and into Hananyas group - but they give wildlife vet John Lewis the run around when he tries to sedate them. Alison is worried about how the recently rescued male capuchins will react when they are moved in together, and orang-utan Kai proves she has far too much energy for the rest of her group.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas
programme.desc: A rugged, sky-high plain in the remote heart of Bolivia, the Andean Altiplano lays claim to towering snow-capped peaks, glowing multi-coloured lagoons, and the worlds largest salt desert.

programme.desc: Meeting natures most wanted to see why some species dont get the respect they deserve, including the great white sharks electrical sensors, the razor-sharp limbs of the dead leaf mantis, and the zombie-creating powers of cordyceps fungi.

programme.desc: Knowing Cleggs fear of women, Truly plots to find his old classmate, who had a liking for liquorice, and deliver her to his doorstep. An ideal refuge would be the library, where Billy Ingleton is to read his own composition to the poetry group.

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses...
programme.desc: Rodney gets an unexpected windfall and decides to take Cassandra on the holiday of a lifetime in Miami, unaware that the non-refundable tickets are for the day of her banks seminar in Eastbourne. In a show of brotherly love, Del naturally offers to accompany Rodders, and so they bid farewell to Peckham and embark on a holiday they are likely never to forget.

programme.title: Still Open All Hours
programme.desc: Granville has inherited the shop from Uncle Arkwright, and is assisted by his son, Leroy. As Granville attempts to get a date with old flame Mavis, Leroy shuns the old delivery bike and finds a more attractive way to deliver the orders.

programme.title: Still Open All Hours
programme.desc: Its Christmas at Arkwrights and Granville has his eye on a tree which gives him more than he bargained for. Nurse Gladys gossips with Mrs Featherstone about tactics for her new job and Eric and Cyril embark on a new fitness plan.

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.desc: Capt Mainwaring has an unexpected and most unwelcome guest, much to the delight of Frazer - his twin brother.

programme.title: Dads Army
programme.sub-title: For The Love of Three Oranges
programme.desc: A special Christmas episode of the classic sitcom. Three oranges are to be auctioned and Captain Mainwaring is determined to get one for his wife.

programme.title: Mrs Browns Boys
programme.desc: After a spate of burglaries in Finglas, Agnes asks Buster Brady to fit a new alarm system. Unfortunately there are a few teething problems with Busters state-of-the-art technology.

programme.title: The Royle Family
programme.desc: It is Christmas Day in the Royle household and Barbara is up to her eyes in it, as Jim is out of action following an unfortunate incident in the precinct while Dave and Denise are feeling the affects of the recession the most, and worry that Anthonys lavish gifts will eclipse their gift of a fridge magnet. Elsewhere, Joe reminisces about a tipsy evening of naked wrestling in front of the fire with Bobby Carter.

programme.title: Teleshopping

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Archaeologist Ben Robinson visits the Norfolk village of Cley next the Sea and discovers that due to Dutch settlers in the Elizabethan era, its not as next the sea as it once was. Ben finds a village green that was once a thriving port with big ships and surrounded by a thriving village. He visits the church and meets Matt Champion, an expert in medieval graffiti who has found some incredible links to past villagers.

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Archaeologist Ben Robinson uncovers the secrets of Cornwalls Tintagel, famed as the legendary birthplace of King Arthur. Ben discovers Tintagel was potentially more important than London a thousand years ago, based on recent evidence unearthed at an archaeological dig overseen by English Heritage. It was found that over 2,000 people were living here which, at the time, which would have made it the largest settlement anywhere of its kind in Britain.

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Archaeologist Ben Robinson visits a small village in Northumberland to find out how the family and village who both share the name Craster have had their lives and fortunes intertwined for over 800 years. The village sits on a unique seam of rock called the Whin Sill and next to the North Sea.

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Lying off the North Sea is the unassuming Suffolk village of Orford. Its behind a large shingle spit called Orford Ness. But as archaeologist Ben Robinson unearths, its been at the forefront of defending the British Isles for over 800 years. Today its imposing castle built by Henry II is being conserved by English Heritage. Curator Dr Shelley Garland explains the process to Ben and how theyve devised the best way to preserve its crumbling stonework.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Up for auction this week is a 1980 Ford Escort, a hand-built 1946 Bedford 12 electric car, and a beautiful, red 1957 Austin Healey.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Derek collects a beautifully restored and carefully modified 1936 Wolseley 14/56. Meanwhile, a Batman-inspired Chrysler Crossfire is dropped off at the Thornton le Dale garage.

programme.title: War Factories
programme.desc: Ferdinand Porsche was one of the most influential engineers in Nazi Germany. By inventing the most powerful war machines, he created the basis for the muscle cars that made his name famous.

programme.title: Secrets and Spies: A Nuclear Game
programme.desc: With Gordievskys help, Britain identifies Mikhail Gorbachev as a possible new contender for Soviet leader. He could be the ticket to better relations between East and West. However, fragile steps towards diplomacy are threatened by vested interests.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the experts pay a visit to the grounds of the Yorkshire Museum in York. Family treasures brought before the cameras include a spy camera disguised as a silver box, a quilt that tells a poignant story, and a small paperweight that has a big surprise in store for its owner.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: A second visit to York, where the team of experts discover more family gems as hundreds descend on the Yorkshire Museum. Treasure emerges in the form of what is believed to be a Viking ring dug up from a field, and a haul of objects found in a jewellery box buried in a local park. Plus, a wooden leg from the days of the Napoleonic wars brings a humorous interlude.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Archaeologist Ben Robinson explores Parkgate, on the estuary of the River Dee in Cheshire. Today the village is landlocked, cut off from the Dee and the Irish Sea due to the estuarys shifting silt. But 250 years ago, it was a bustling harbour and as Ben finds out from Dr Gillian OBrian, Parkgate was a gateway for thousands of Irish immigrants from the 1620s onwards.

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Archaeologist Ben Robinson uncovers how the health and fortune of the village was shaped by those in charge of Bamburghs famous castle.

programme.title: Villages by the Sea
programme.desc: Archaeologist Ben Robinson uncovers the secrets of the Edwardian village of Thorpeness in Suffolk, the first purpose-built seaside village in the UK.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team return to Manchester Town Hall where a big crowd awaits with their family treasures.
